name: #02 Amphetamine
description: Amphetamine or alpha-methylphenethylamine is a central nervous system stimulant that is used in the treatment of attention deficit hyperactivity disorder, narcolepsy, and obesity. It is a psychostimulant drug, which means they speed up the messages traveling between the brain and the body. Their appearance varies from powder and tablet form to crystals and capsules. They may be packaged in ‘foils’ (aluminum foil), plastic bags, or small balloons when sold illegally.
